name: Timberman (itch) (hELLOFish)
description:
Timberman is BEST Flat style casual game on your Android.

Become a GREAT Timber man, Chop wood and avoid the branches. It's easy to play but hard to master.

Take your axe as every lumberjack does and chop the tree as fast as you can!
Tap left to chop left, tap right to chop right, dont let the branches hit you.
Simple right? Well lets see how you get on...

Controls： Mouse or Keyboard

Mouse left buttonLeft arrowMouse right buttonRight arrow
